definition: sleeping sickness/African trypanosomiasis/see also 非洲錐蟲病|非洲锥虫病[Fei1 zhou1 zhui1 chong2 bing4]

sentences.english: At Oktoberfest, many people drink too much beer and then pass out.
sentences.chinese: 在啤酒節時，許多人會因喝太多啤酒而昏睡不醒。

sentences.english: There were 28 cases diagnosed as confusion, 3 cases as stupor.
sentences.chinese: 研究組考慮28例爲意識模糊，3例爲昏睡狀態。

sentences.english: Bree: But people in comas dream, don't they?
sentences.chinese: 但人們會在昏睡中做夢，對嗎？

sentences.english: UnitllUntil now, the drug melarsoprol was used to treat patients in the advanced stages of sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，治療晚期昏睡病患者時都用硫腫蜜胺藥物。

sentences.english: Rental-market strength is also rousing a long-dormant building industry.
sentences.chinese: 租房市場的強勢還喚醒了處於長期昏睡狀態的建造業。

sentences.english: Trypanosoma gambiense is responsible for ninety percent of the reported cases of sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 昏睡病病案報告的90%起因於岡比亞錐蟲。

sentences.english: ThypanosomaTrypanosoma gambiense is responsible for 90% of the reported cases of sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 已報告的昏睡病病例中90%都是感染了岡比亞錐蟲。

sentences.english: The more common symptoms are nasal discharge , poor appetite, and lethargy.
sentences.chinese: 比較常見的徵狀是流鼻涕，食慾不佳以及昏睡。

sentences.english: Sleeping sickness is spread by the bite of the tsetse fly.
sentences.chinese: 昏睡症由孑孓蠅的啃咬傳播。

sentences.english: I put it on and fell asleep in the scent of him.
sentences.chinese: 我把它穿在身上，伴着馬克的氣味昏睡過去。

sentences.english: Several hours after the surgery, she was still in her lethargy .
sentences.chinese: 手術過後幾小時，她仍然昏睡不醒。

sentences.english: Until now, the drugrhodesiensemelarsoprol was used to treat patients in the advanced stages ofthe sleeping sickness.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，美拉胂醇被用來治療晚期昏睡病病人。

sentences.english: Several hours after the surgery, she was still in her lethargy.
sentences.chinese: 手術過後幾小時，她仍然昏睡不醒。

sentences.english: He remains fit and healthy and shows no sign of lethargy.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然身體健康，並沒有顯示出昏睡的跡象。

sentences.english: He says a less costly, easy-to-use medicine for sleeping sickness is badly needed.
sentences.chinese: 他說現在昏睡病極需一種低成本，使用簡便的藥物。

sentences.english: The cat became lethargic and had trouble breathing.
sentences.chinese: 這隻貓整天昏睡而且呼吸困難。

definition: to lose consciousness/to be in a coma/stupor/coma/stunned/disoriented
to be delirious/to be mentally confused
to be fast asleep/(fig.) to lie dormant/to lie undiscovered
